text: Ok Bugbuster 9218, time to kill some bugs.
Hello! my name is...
HEY! They dont pay us to chat. They pay us to kill bugs. TEN credits per bug.
Oh I'm sorry... *jerk*
So listen up, remember the simulator? Same deal here.
Alright, I shoot with SPACEBAR.
That's right, and when you see a group, you can nuke 'em with C.
You can carry only 3 nukes, but I can supply you when you're out.
Gotcha.
Last thing, see that satellite? PROTECT IT. That's our ticket back home.
Yeah I remember that. They can bring us back with it, right?
Exactly. Oh, there they are, SHOOT 'EM!
It looks like they're escaping... Why they don't fight back?
Just shoot them rookie.
This doesn't look like a threat to me...
Whatever, it looks like a new car to me.
Whoa!
Did you see that!?
See what, greenpeace?
FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU
...And there goes my pension.
What are we gonna do!
They never attacked us before! I guess they just had enough...
How are we going to go back home!
Fuck, just two days till my retirement.
Ok, focus. You can do this.
